abstract: T. Boone Pickens, the Texas billionaire and energy tycoon, has sued Lehman Brothers Holdings for $59.9 million, claiming the bankrupt investment bank breached its contract by failing to repay collateral posted by Mr. Pickens.
lead_paragraph: T. Boone Pickens, the Texas billionaire and energy tycoon, has sued Lehman Brothers Holdings for $59.9 million, claiming the bankrupt investment bank breached its contract by failing to repay collateral posted by Mr. Pickens.

abstract: Companies like AT&T and Verizon have long been considered a safe bet in troubled times. But a Sanford C. Bernstein analyst predicts that they will suffer too.
snippet: Companies like AT&T and Verizon have long been considered a safe bet in troubled times. But a Sanford C. Bernstein analyst predicts that they will suffer too.
lead_paragraph: Communications companies like AT&T and Verizon have long been considered a safe bet in troubled times. But Craig Moffett, an analyst at Sanford C. Bernstein & Company, predicts the economic downturn will take its toll on those companies next year as credit becomes harder to get and customers tighten their belts.

headline.main: Crisis Will Hit Telecom Business, Analyst Says
